item.title: Boeing 737-800, the model that crashed in South Korea, is one of the world's most popular aircraft
item.description: Accident investigators are trying to find the cause of a Jeju Air fatal crash landing that killed 179 of the 181 on board the flight.

item.title: Jimmy Carter quotes: 'I could have wiped Iran off the map'
item.description: "I could have wiped Iran off the map," Jimmy Carter told CNBC in 2014. Memorable quotes from the 39th president.

item.title: Jeju Air crash: Boeing shares fall after South Korea orders 737-800 inspection
item.description: Uncertainty surrounds the exact circumstances of the crash, which killed 179 of 181 people on board the flight on Sunday.

item.title: Jimmy Carter, the farmer, president and Nobel-winning peace crusader, dies at age 100
item.description: Jimmy Carter, the nation's 39th president, lived longer than any other occupant of the Oval Office.

item.title: Democrats and Republicans honor former President Jimmy Carter's lifetime of service
item.description: Politicians recognized Carter for his presidential accomplishments and humanitarian work after he left the White House.
